pr_title: OIA-26: Expose intrinsic tag names as constants for TSS API

timeline.message: OIA-26: Expose intrinsic tag names as constants for TSS API
OIA-26: Expose intrinsic tag names as constants for TSS API: Fix osgi dependency

timeline.bodyText: Currently, I have no clue how the release cycle for the integration layer works. Do we have to change this before we merge to release-26 but after we released the integration API?
timeline.author: fooker

replies.bodyText:
Me neither. Every new commit in the master of the Integration API will release a new snapshot build automatically. So OpenNMS will compile and work. But of course we should reference a fixed version of the Integration Api before we release a new Opennms version.
@RangerRick would you know how we should proceed here?
replies.author: patrick-schweizer

replies.bodyText: Talked to @RangerRick : It is ok to merge now. We just need to make a new Integration API version before a release. He will have his release script check for that :-)
replies.author: patrick-schweizer
